fulltext:
THINH TRINH 
MOBILE TEAM LEADER (REACT NATIVE) 
Birthday: 19th August 1990 
Gender: Male 
Address: 692 Xo Viet Nghe Tinh, Binh Thanh District 
Phone: 0989 831 955 
Email: thinhtrh@gmail.com 
Skype / Telegram: thinhtrh 
Skills Summary 
-Over 5 years of work experiences in IT industry (with more than 5 years 
working in Mobile App development industry, participating in various 
Mobile development project from start to finish). 
-Strong experience of mobile development, including: Android (Java, 
Android SDK) and Cross-Platform (React Native). 
-Experience working with various mobile platforms, including: Facebook 
SDK, Google SDK , Firebase, AppsFlyer, Fabric, OneSignal … 
-Very good experience working with Javascript programming technologies: 
React Native, Redux, Redux Saga, Redux Thunk, Mobx … 
-Work with Restful API, Websocket … 
-Source code management: Git, svn … 
-Project management: Jira, Trello … 
-Good at research and teamwork 
2 
Education 
University: University of Information Technology - Vietnam National 
University, Ho Chi Minh City.  
Major: Software Engineering  
Graduation year: December 2013  
Marks/ GPA: 7.2 
Experience 
• Mobile Team Leader (React Native) 
Apr, 2018 – now / TP&P Technology 
- Project: Alumni Network – Alumni app is a private network platform 
solution allowing individual alumni members and professionals to 
search and connect with one another. In addition, Alumni app 
also offers many alumni organizations (e.g. university) a platform to 
serve, connect and keep their alumni members updated. 
- Mobile Platform: React Native, Redux, Redux Saga, React 
Navigation, React Native Maps, React Native Push Notification … 
- Back End: APS.NET, SignalR 
- Mobile Team Size: 4 
- Current Phase: 3 
- Apple Store:  
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/the-
alumni/id1387497105?l=vi&ls=1&mt=8 
3 
- Google Play: 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=business.private.al
umni.social.network 
I joined TP&P and built core project for mobile platform. Now, I 
make plan, estimate task, assign task, support my teammates to 
resolve all problem, improve performance and build, release app, 
work with Backend team leader, BA to design all feature, resolve 
all client-server problem … 
• React Native Freelance 
- Academy App (late 2016) 
- CRM App (2017) 
• Android developer 
Client developer / late 2015 – Feb, 2018 / MEM – Importing game 
corporation 
Work at MDK team, where built all SDK for games of MEM. SDKs are 
third party that contain Login, Payment, Event module … We build 
them to Android / IOS / WP library then our partner will integrate 
into their game. 
• Java developer – Android developer 
Client developer / late 2013 – 2015/ ME – Game corporation 
Work at M4 center, where built and growing iWin Online – a Casino 
game. I work on Libgdx – a Java Framework for game and took 
care all problem of Android Platform 
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)
